Before you prepare the drives for an Azure Import/Export job, you need to create two files:

1. An XML manifest file: This file describes the data that you want to import or export, including the type of data, the file paths, and the storage account and container to use. You can create this file manually or by using the AzCopy command-line tool.

Question 27 of 50
Single choice question
You have a Recovery Service vault that
you use to test backups. The test
backups contain two protected virtual
machines.
You need to delete the Recovery
Services vault.
What should you do first?
Select the correct answer
From the Recovery Service vault, delete the backup data
Modify the disaster recovery properties of each virtual machine
Modify the locks of each virtual machine
From the Recovery Service vault, stop the backup of each backup item

Before you can delete a Recovery Service vault, you must unregister the items that are protected by the vault.

Therefore, the correct answer is:

From the Recovery Service vault, delete the backup data

You should first delete the backup data from the Recovery Service vault. This will unregister the protected virtual machines and other items from the vault. After you have deleted the backup data, you can then delete the Recovery Service vault.

Modify the VM size property of VM1

The correct answer is "Modify the VM size property of VM1". By increasing the size of the virtual machine, it will have access to more processing power and memory, which can improve the performance of App1 during its peak usage at the end of each month. A runbook can be created in Azure Automation to automate the process of resizing the virtual machine at a specific time each month.

Question 38 of 50
Single choice question
You have a deployment template
named Template1 that is used to
deploy 10 Azure web apps.
You need to identify what to deploy
before you deploy Template1. The
solution must minimize Azure costs.
What should you identify?
Select the correct answer
five Azure Application Gateways
one App Service plan
10 App Service plans
one Azure Traffic Manager

The correct answer is one App Service plan. By using a single App Service plan, you can host multiple web apps on a single set of compute resources, minimizing Azure costs. If you used 10 App Service plans, you would be paying for 10 separate sets of compute resources.

instances as quickly as possible.
What should you do?
Select the correct answer
Deploy five virtual machines. Modify the Availability Zones settings for each virtual machine
Deploy five virtual machines. Modify the Size setting for each virtual machine
Deploy one virtual machine scale set that is set to VM (virtual machines) orchestration mode

Deploy one virtual machine scale set that is set to VM (virtual machines) orchestration mode. This will allow you to deploy a group of identical VMs and manage them as a single resource, with automatic scaling capabilities.

Question 42 of 50
You plan to automate the deployment
of a virtual machine scale set that uses
the Windows Server 2016 Datacenter
Image.
You need to ensure that when the
Scale set virtual machines are
provisioned, they have web server
Components installed.
Which two actions should you
pertorm?
Each correct answer presents part of
the solution
Select the correct answer(s)
Upload a configuration script
Create an automation account
Modify the extensionProfile section of the Azure Resource Manager template
Create a new virtual scale set in the Azure portal

Correct answers are:

* Upload a configuration script
* Modify the extensionProfile section of the Azure Resource Manager template

Explanation: To ensure that web server components are installed when the scale set virtual machines are provisioned, you can use the Azure Resource Manager (ARM) template to modify the extensionProfile section of the template and specify a custom script extension that installs the components. You can also upload the configuration script that installs the components and specify its location in the extensionProfile section of the template. The automation account and creating a new virtual scale set are not required to achieve this goal.
